page.title: 15RECREATION IN CURDWORTH
page.content: CURDWORTH IS WELL PROVIDED WITH MEANS FOR RECREATION. THE KING GEORGE V PLAYING FIELDS HAVE A FOOTBALL PITCH, TENNIS COURT, A CHILDREN'S PLAYGROUND AND AN ADVENTURE PLAY AREA. THE SCHOOL ALSO HAS ITS OWN SPORTS FIELD. HORSE RIDING IS A POPULAR PASTIME, THERE ARE STABLES ACCOMMODATING PRIVATELY OWNED AND HIRE HORSES. THE FAZELEY CANAL OUTSKIRTS THE VILLAGE GIVING LOCAL ANGLERS AMPLE SCOPE FOR FISHING. THE ATTRACTIVE APPEARANCE OF GARDENS IN THE AREA SHOW THAT MOST PEOPLE FIND GARDENING A REWARDING HOBBY. MANY PLAY GOLF, THE BELFRY COURSE IS NEAR BY ALSO KINGSBURY WATER PARK A SHORT DISTANCE AWAY OFFERS SAILING, WINDSURFING AND WATERSKING. A MOBILE LIBRARY CALLS EACH WEEK. INDOOR GAMES MAINLY DARTS AND DOMINOES ARE PLAYED IN THE WHITE HORSE AND BEEHIVE PUBLIC HOUSES.
